        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        from - the user's id after they are logged in. It's the same id as which you would recognize a signed-in user in your system.

        Specified by:
        page in interface SegmentService
        Parameters:
        userId - The ID for this user in your database.
        name - The webpage name you’re tracking. We recommend human-readable names like Login or Register.

      • track

        public void track(String userId,
                  String event,
                  Consumer<MessageBuilderWithProperties> builder)
        Description copied from interface: SegmentService
        track lets you record the actions your users perform.
        Specified by:
        track in interface SegmentService
        Parameters:
        userId - The ID for this user in your database.
        event - The name of the event you’re tracking. We recommend human-readable names like Played Song or Updated Status.
